summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6180 for the improvement of West Armour Street from 23rd Avenue West to 28th Avenue West; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87067, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
